attributes.title: worst decision ever
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see if it would fit in my car but it didn’t because it did and then i just wanted to say happy birthday to myself but i wasn’t born yet so i went to the kitchen to take a bath but the shower was in the fridge which is why i’m not hungry anymore only to find out that i was dead of starvation but that’s weird cause i was born tomorrow so i couldn’t be dead then i had a dream that cheeto man wanted to be my only friend but no bc all friends matter 🤚🏼. so selfish of him, 10/10 would not recommend even acknowledging that he exists

attributes.title: I almost died...
attributes.review: So I go to open the app right and I was literally blinded with racism and whiteness that I had to go to the eye doctor and get my eye sight checked out. Now I am blind and it’s ruined my life. The only color I can see is Cheeto dust 🤮🤮not only did this app blind me but it also destroyed my phone just because I’m Mexican... some whack stuff

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app, typed in my phone number and I immediately got a virus. Then I got a text to my phone saying that if I didn’t send a photo of my toes, they’d kidnap my cat and force feed me three pies. They even threatened to kidnap me and leave me stranded in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean! :/ I will not be downloading this app again.

attributes.title: no
attributes.review: This app is just not it, it glitches way to much to the point where I can’t use it. I would highly recommend to not download this app, it is worthless just like our current president. Do yourself a favor and keep scrolling and look for another app.

attributes.title: The worst app
attributes.review: It would not load and the only thing that happened when I finally got it to load was this big orange crying because life is not going how it wants it to and he can’t mind control everyone to agree with racist and homophobic views about everything. Absolutely disgusting. Also save Barron Trump.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Absolutely terrible. I open the app to see a hot Cheeto and it burned my ears immediately I had to call the hospital and they had me in a coma for 8 years and i missed everything and my fish even died in that time I was in a coma if you want your fish and you to live I recommend not getting this app thank you.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!!!
attributes.review: I HIGHLY DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP!!!! the first time i opened the app my screen was flooded with pictures of a naked cheeto man. it also started glitching like crazy and made my phone completely shut off. for a few hours i couldn’t delete the app because it was glitching but i figured it out and everything was fine.

attributes.title: a mess of an app...
attributes.review: when i first opened the app peppa pig was on the loading screen doing some fortnite dances. i then opened the actual app just to find pictures of gru, from despicable me with a wig and fairy wings on dancing around my screen. i clicked on a button, and there is was... the hype house battling the mickey mouse clubhouse. it was a fierce battle but the clubhouse came out on top✊🏼 i was utterly shocked that the mice dogs and ducks dodged all of charli and addisons renegading didn’t knock them outta the sahara desert. when i left the app, it’s like it took over my phone, with lots of cows eating pomegranates. crazy🤩

attributes.title: EXTREMELY HARMFUL
attributes.review: this vile excuse of an app has put my life in danger as it has caused me to feel nausea and disgust as i literally started to smell cheeto dust and racism after i spent more than 7 seconds on this app. i cannot imagine giving this horrible man a platform to spread and promote his caucasian brain dead ideas. please delete this app for the safety of us all. thanks! 😀🦶🏼✨

attributes.title: Worst App I’ve Ever Downloaded
attributes.review: I have never been more disappointed by not only an app, but also a human being. Donald Trump is the worst president this country has ever seen and this app really reflects that energy. Every time I try to open the app it crashes immediately and I feel my rights being stripped away. STAY AWAY FROM THIS APP!!!
